No one is offering you weapons. You do not need weapons. You already have too many lethal weapons and they are damaging your cause.

Do not kill the police. Do not deliberately kill anyone. If you do, you will lose the world's sympathy. You will lose the war.

You are not at war with the police. You are at war with the CCP. The war is not on the streets of HK, it is in the world's media. The battles you conduct with the police are important, they are fuel to keep the attention of the world's media. Win or lose, they will still pay attention. But, if you win on the street, if you best the police, then the results of that attention will be very bad for you. You will lose the war with the CCP.

Even in Canada, when a separatist movement in Quebec deliberately killed someone, the Canadian government of the day called out the army. Most anywhere in the world, the army will get called out if the police are beaten. It's justified. Civil order is part of an army's job. Do not do anything that will make it reasonable for the CCP to send in the PLA to HK.

If civil order in HK becomes the PLA's job, you cannot win in street battles no matter the weapons or training you have. No chance at all, no matter how hard you try, no matter what you do, no matter who you can convince to help you. Anyone with any military understand can look at a map and tell you that. You have no chance. You will simply get yourself and many other innocent people killed. Men, woman, children... little girls with their heads blown off, burned alive, torn to shreds. Is that what you want? Do you have any concept of how destructive modern military weapons are? It's not just about you and your heroic notions. Many, many people's lives are at stake. Don't do it.

You cannot harm the CCP by killing HK police. The CCP doesn't care. In fact, I expect they would be quite happy if you did as it would give them justification to eliminate you. They don't care how much damage they cause to HK in the process of eliminating you. They've build shiny new cities bigger than HK in a few years. They've got lots of people willing to live there. They could literally level the entire city of HK and rebuild it... wouldn't really hurt them at all... if they were justified in doing it. Do not give them that justification.

You win when you turn the world's opinion against the CCP. You are doing that now. Don't blow it.

Your goal is to increase the cost to the CCP that they leave you alone until 2047. Those costs are not from HK but from the world. You need world opinion on your side. If the CCP won't back down, you need to get them to roll the PLA in without reasonable justification. That will keep world opinion. But, you must NOT fight the PLA.

You do not need weapons beyond what protesters typically have. Do not kill the police. Do not kill the PLA soldiers. If you do, you will lose the war, you will lose HK. And, you'll probably get a lot of innocent people killed in the process.
If they directly sell weapons to us, this is good news.
